Stole this from Laura. Lol. 1. Spell your name backwards: anna. kinda funny. 2. The story behind your aim screen name : scott doland. do i need to say more? 3. How old are you?: almost 18!!! 4. Where do you live?: unfortunatly...loowisiana -- Describe your -- 1. Wallet: do I actually own one of those? 2. Hair Brush: I have like 50. 3. Jewelry worn daily: my necklace we made at Survivor 4. Pillow cover: its got stripes.. 5. Coffee cup: Starbucks cup 6. Shoes: flip flops 7. Favorite Cologne/Perfume: On guys: Curve, Us: Ralph Lauren 8. CD in stereo right now: hm...burnt CDs 9. Piercing: just ears, because my parents suck!!! 10. What you wearing right now: soffee shorts and t-shirt. 11. Hair: Brownish 12. In my head: a little brain? thinking about junk. 13. Wishing: i could trust people 14. After this: win my bet 15. Talking to: Wesley on the phone 16. Eating: nothing 17. Fetishes: ha ha that 'burban 18. Something you're looking forward to in the upcoming months: um going to the Naval Academy. 19. The last thing you ate: pizza 20. Something that you are deathly afraid of: Lemme get back on that one. -- Do you -- 1. Do you like candles: yes 2. Do you like incense: yes 3. Do you believe in love: yes 4. Do you believe in soul mates: maybe 5. Do you believe in love at first site: no 6. Do you believe in forgiveness: definitely 7. If you could have any animal pet: I just got a fish!!! But I want a hampster. 8. What are 3 cities you wouldn't mind relocating to?: Austin,TX...Anapolis,MD,...somewhere in Cali 9. What's something you wish you could understand better?: peoples motives. 10. Anyone you miss that you haven't seen in a long time?: Wesley..Kathleen, well I've seen her but, ya know. -- In the last 24 hours, have you -- 1. Cried: yeah 2. Bought something: nope 3. Gotten sick: nope 4. Sang: yah lol 5. Eatin: well yeah... 6. Felt stupid: always 7. Wanted to tell someone you love them: yes 8. Met someone new: nope

Weeellllll I just got back from Survivor. So freakin awesome. Seriously. I'm so tired. Stayed at Merediths friday night...definitely went to bed at 3. Got up at 6 something. It was at Camp Edgewood. Did all the challenges. Rentrop was my partner lol. Swam in the lake, defeated the wasps. So much stuff. It was just...awesome. It's bad when it takes a trip like that to make you think, but awesome when you actually do think. They got us up at 5 to do the obstacle course, I'm tired. Gonna go wash the lake water out of my hair..then sleep. So awesome...lol.
its gotten better, we're not friends anymore, but its for the best. sadie is tonite. i'm doing something with kyle (: um.. survivor is tomorrow..yay! gotta go pack.
yeah it all came out tonight. gay. i got another ticket. shit.

i've been thinking a lot. its not you. just leave it alone, seriously. i didn't mean to be mean, or make you cry..it just came out that way. sorry. i am. my day: 1st - talked to tiff. looked at kyle. lol 2nd - took a test..whoo yay anna lowest grade in the class!!! 3rd - self portraits. everybody sees me as an alcoholic. ? lunch - the usual 4th - math. blah. 5th - test?!?! 6th - gah conner is gay. tried to finish my math homework. 7th - um, we 'ran' lol. like a 30 minute mile. then i went to krystals. we had a talk. actually a 'write'. it was good. things are gonna change.
i like him. (:
i hate you and your stupid opinions. opinions of what i should do. opinions of who i should be. opinions of me.

saw 'mean girls' last night with tiff and krystal. learned a lot of new stuff. lol. thats fetch. we were fetch. fetch. we decided the summer after we graduate we're all gonna get an apartment together before we leave for college. it'll be nice. it's mom day. i bought her something. with my dads credit card. its the thought that counts. school tomorrow. i need bugs.
by the way, kathleen would make SUCH a better president and thats soooooo GAY. and WRONG. fuckin stupid ass freshman. lol. i'm done.

saturday school was greeeeeeaatt. got a packet thingy today from the naval academy. describes my week there as "the most physical and mental challenging week of your life"...oh yay...with "group runs of 3 or more miles followed by intense physical training every morning @ 5 AM." Mmmm hmmm. Why do I want this? Oh yeah cuz I wanna go to college. I'm having a mid-life 'where do I want to go to college' crisis. Either way I'm going far away. I'm about to go clean my house. Trying to earn money. I need a job.
my parents left. they in s'poooort. so we chillin. me and kathlizzleeeen. i think i'm drujn.
it all falls down on me.

Seriously I hate it. I hate you. I hate how nothing I do is good enough for you. I FUCKING HATE YOU. Now that I have that out... Went to Starbucks this mornin. Went to school. It sucked. After school. Fight with Krystal (if u wanna call it that!??!) It doesn't even phase me anymore. Whatever. Me and Kathleen came to my house and made shoes and crap. For her 'campaigning.' Then fighting. Mmmm hmmm. I REALLY HATE YOU.

My weekend: Friday: After school we took family pictures. Gross. Got Kathleen and went to Carlyss to get her straightener. Came home, got ready. Went to Contraband. Came home at 11:30. 11:30!!!! Better than my 4 AM last weekend. Saturday: We got up and went and got Crawfish then went to the mall. I got in trouble and Steve said I couldn't go anywhere. So Krystal came over and we talked. Thats about it. This weekend sucked. Now I'm catchin bugs.
wow. ummmm... yeah.
This is the craziest week. At least he doesn't hate me. So hot.

um um um... last night we chilled @ patricks. WOW that was crazy. Rob is really hot. went back to laurens and had the funniest argument ever. seriously. seriously funny. and dumb. and pointless. got up @ 6 today. went and woke krystal up lol. went and developed pictures from last night. krystal saw them...lol. rob is so hot. went jet skiing all day. got stranded on the island w/kyle. lol. ummm ummm. he's gettin up @ 9 to take me jet skiin tomorrow, he just doesn't know it yet. yeah...

WoW! Um yeah Lauren and Tiff were supposed to pick me up from the airport thursday. But they blew me off to see Harry Potter. So Krystal and Kyle pick me up and we get home and Tiff and Lauren are all like 'suprise'. They cleaned my room and filled it w/balloons and stuff. It was crazy. My week... Oh it was crazy. Everyday up @ 5 for PT. Wednesday was Sea Trials. We ran 11 miles total. I stopped counting pushups at 400. How I did it, I'll never know. It was pretty awesome though. I dunno if I'm still gonna apply tho. Umm..last night we went to Kelli's. Found out some stuff. Got real mad. Now I'm here.
well i'm off to the Naval Academy. i'll be in Annapolis next week. i miss you guys. pray i dont die. lol. later

weeeellllllllll...lol last night was THE BEST. we roughed it. me, lauren, tiff and jerkins camped. in a tent behind my house. we made a fire too. it wouldnt die. we jammed vanilla ice at 2 in the mornin at wal-mart. great night. and tomorrow i leave. i'll miss u guys.!.!
So I've got this new obsession with MercyMe. It's great. I leave in 2 days!! I'm freakin out... Oh well.

ummm... today was tha last day of band camp. it sucked cuz i was so out of it. cuz we stayed up last nite. @ tiffany's. wow we are gonna have so much fun corrupting kate and taylor. annnnnd we did excerises. those are the best. um i worked tonight. it was fun except i felt like crap. but thats ooooook. so now imma go to bed. cuz me and lauren are gettin up to go to lafayette in the mornin. woo woo. ok holla.

weeelllll.... lauren said i need to blog. cuz i havent today. so here YA go. i am waiting for her to get ready. we are going...somewhere. who knows. kyles maybe? anyways. my eyes hurt. everything hurts. um i tried on like 9 different contacts. trying to get the right color. and i still didnt. cuz my eyes are too dark. they're gay. so anyways. we are leaving. so allrights. here ya go LAUREN. oh annnnd... Taylor IS going to barbe, woo woo! we are so good!

TAYLOR WANTS TO GO TO BARBE!!!!! WOO WOO!!!!! shes cool now. seriously. um um um. today sucked. drum camp sucked. i swam @ kyles on my lunch break. that was kool. then camp sucked. and sucked some more. and some people complain so damn much. seriously. and then i got done @ 5. went to work @ 6. now i'm tired. as hell. but i have to go practice. so i'm out.

tonight... um we went to tiffs. and tried to talk taylor into going to barbe. but shes not. cuz she suck. so we like kate better. and then we went to see 13 going on 30. and we were real loud. and little kids threw candy at us. and i cried during the movie. cuz i missed wesley. but its okay. aaaaannnd. after it we dropped them off. then went to kyles. 'and kyle is in alabama. so that was interesting. and he told us where his spare key is. while hes out of town. woo woo. so yeah it was fun. now i'm going to bed. cuz i have another day of fun drum camp. woo woo.
today was drum camp. gay gay gay. no it wasnt that bad. my FEET hurt. now i'm waitin for lauren to get off. yo. and yeah. for sure. layduh.

today i went to church. then came home. then played tennis with my bro. then swam. then slept. then um um um. lauren came over. and cleaned my room for me. thanks lauren lol. then i broke her moms car. lol. um tomorrow we have drum camp. so gay. gay gay gay.
Today.... Um Lauren woke me up And my mom was out of town. So we swam and got in the jacuzzi lol. Then me, Lauren and Chris fell asleep in the bed. So I was late. And yeah. Thats about it. Layduh

um um um... lets see thursday night i sold kyle some alcohol. it was nice. then i chilled with him @ 'manhattan' lol until 12 something-ish. then yesterday i went to pauley's for a while and hung out w/him and jake. and practiced drummin. then um last night tiff and lauren called me and they were like 'hey we already told our parents we were staying the night @ your house.' so i was like umm ok. and them and kyle met me @ 11 and kyle was drunk. so i had to drive kyles jeep out to BFE to get his cousin. cuz he couldn't drive then we came to my house @ like 1:30. and talked. and i woke up and my mom was gone. and i call and shes on the way to shreveport. so me and tiff are just chillin. we are about to lay out. then watch ashlee simpson @ 2. for sure. thaaaaaats allll.

Wow we went to Beaumont yesterday. That was great. I walked in on a guy in the dressing rooms @ hollister. That was baaaad. And Tiff got Ki-ya's. We went to Joes Crab Shack. Our waiter was gay. But also incredibly cool. He sat down and talked with us. THEN Joey the hot waiter walked in. And we told our waiter what we did with the 18th birthday thing. Then Joey came and sat with us. And we talked to him. And he is so incredibly hot. Wow I'm going to Joe's every weekend now. Except next weekend. We're going to Lafayette. Tiff choked. On cake. And drooled. And had an accident. And we tried to leave. But we were trapped in the patio. So Joey comes outside to tell us bye. Where we make ourselves look stupider. Ah he wants us. lol. So yeah that was our trip. For sure. Then we went and saw 'mean girls' again. Which was fetch. Annnnnnnnd I really wanna go out. But I have to work!?!!?! What are these people thinking? But yeah. Thats about it. Oh yeah I got another ticket yesterday. They're out to get me I swear. Dammit.

_-_stuff_-_ I love: ~The Ashlee Simpson Show. ~And Newylyweds. ~Stupid people, they're great. ~Tiff and Lauren - they are the best even though we fight over stupid crap. ~My woo woo lights in my car. ~My boyfriend even though he's far away. ~The freedom I get since he's far away. ~Sex. ~Eating. I do it to much. ~Yha. lol. ~My parents. Compared to some, they're REALLY good. ~Ryan Cabrera. ~Hotels with jacuzzis. ~Overflowing hotel room jacuzzis. ~Sex in hotel jacuzzis. ~Jet skis. ~David Jerkins and Kyle massages. ~Pizza. ~Grocery shopping. ~How I ALWAYS manage to get out of crap. ~My friends. That deserves 2. ~Starbucks. ~How things are right now. Everything happens for whats better. And its good. I hate: ~Allergies. ~How everything is designed for right handed people. ~Bad drivers. Cough. ~Xbox. ~Cops. ~Stupid parents. ~Psychotic parents. ~Fighting over stupid stuff. ~How people never just SAY what they mean. ~When people say its wrong to be mean to somebodys face if you dont like them becuz, you SHOULD be 2 faced and act like u like them? ~Too too much for me to list. I dance: ~Not often. ~Maybe twice a year. ~Badly. I sing: ~Worse than I dance. ~In the shower. I fear: ~College and that all my plans wont work out. ~That we wont stick together. ~That something will happen to Wes in Iraq. ~That he'll forget me. I regret: ~Fighting tonight. ~Not always being open. ~Trying to be somebody I'm not. ~Freshman year. I'll always remember: ~Girls nights. And how they never end up as girl nights. ~Beaumont. ~Manhattan Station. ~Basically, every stupid thing we've done. I recently: ~Decided my future _-_favorite_-_ friend[s]: ~Thats a hard one. But I kinda like that Tiff. And some Lauren. And some Jerkins and Kyle. Wes, he's cool. TJ is great too. Blah. show: ~THE ASHLEE SIMPSON SHOW!!!!! She's like, our hero, lol. word: ~Fetch. ~Yo. ~Dude. ~For sure. ~Yha! cd: ~My ASHLEE SIMPSON Cd. Ha ha. _-_dream/idea_-_ vacation: ~weeelllllll I'm not sure. But we'll take care of it next year. Senior trip woo woo. lol. date: ~That shed was nice. guy/girl: ~I wonder? day: ~I like fridays. _-_last_-_ argument: ~over a 30 minute time difference. Wow. shower: ~like 10 mins ago. movie: ~Confessions of A Teenage Drama Queen - OMG u guys that was so horrible. heard: ~Listenin to Ryan Cabrera hurt: ~everytime I think of the 18 months. f elt: ~Mad. Now I'm cool. Person you told u loved: ~Wes _-_relationship_-_ bf/gf : ~Yeah.... love is: ~Taken too lightly. Even by me. Mistaken for something else. been in love: ~Unfortunately because its NEVER gonna be right. But yeah lol. cheated: ~me!?!?!?!?! been cheated on: ~yha yha longest kept friend: ~funny question. ~Umm Hannah Waters probably. I love the opposite sex because: ~One thing. Hmm..? : _-_if_I_-_ could change one thing about the world: ~people wouldn't be so stupid. could have anybody I wanted: ~they'd be here. could be a kid again: ~i'm still a kid yo had a million dollars: ~isn't that a song? _-_other_-_ thrown anything at a moving car: ~oh yeah lots. kindergarten: ~was a difficult time. something I could listen to a million times is: ~True - Ryan Cabrera ~Pieces of me ~Girls just wanna have fun lol ~Ice ice baby ~Vibrate I take my showers: ~often? I go to sleep wearing: ~not much before I fall asleep I: ~write in my journal. the most important things in life to me is: ~my friends. ~having fun which requires taking risks, cuz this is THE time for it. ~my family. ~me, duh. I was bored. Now I'm going to bed. We're going to Beaumont tomorrow. Yaaaay. Lay-duh.

monty's mom is still out to get me. but she cant. i'm too good. we are too good. but yeah. we gotta go to astro world. we only have like, a week left. tiff is in florida tho. ): anyways. i read this real good book yesterday... um um um. yeah i'm about to go shopping. for sure.

wow so its like 6 in the mornin. last night was crasie. i'm screeeewd. we all hung out. it was good. its caseys fault. today... i need to go to drum practice today. but i caaaant. i dont think. anyways. i'm out. just waitin for it.

blah. the grocery industry is hard work. lol. um um um. wes is going to iraq and that always sucks. so far 875 army guys been killed. wes wants to get married before he leaves, so if he dies i get $250,000. lol. bad idea. i feel crappy about him leavin, but i'm in an ok mood. a year and a half. wow. um um um. i'm thinking about a lot of stuff lately. thinking is baaaaad.
crap crap crap.
oh yeah dating Monty? HELL NO!! lol. Me and Lauren enjoy our single-ness too much.
ha ha ha i bet she feels like a deush bag. i think i spelt that wrong. oh well.
In 3 months I'll be an adult. I can vote. (yay?) I can buy tobacco. (gross) I'm an adult. (riiiiight) I can go to clubs. legally. (YAAAAAAYYYY) 3 months is a long time.

ya know, today was a good day. i didn't worry that much. i didn't think about...everything. i got up and lauren and me went to school. then we went to La Fitness. and then we went and saw mike and picked out plants for our future apartment. ummm then we went to tiffs. but tiff was working. so we were bored. and we put about 500 pink post it notes on her walls. with junk written on them. and blew up balloons. and kate made animals with them. and bought her a tiffany barbie. and then came home. and my dog tried to molest me. sooo me and lauren watched starsky and hutch. then we made dances. for songs. that was the greatest. and i sang to my brother. um um um. it was a good day. and we wanna go play softball tomorrow. dunno y. we just do, yo. so yeah that was my day. we had drama yesterday. it came out good though. no promises or plans or crap that i always do. just realization and fear of loss. and i really cant lose another good friend. it'll work out. and btw... i do realize what it does. i've seen it happen. and it does make you lose friends.. friends that you do want. good friends. and that really sucks. and i dont want it to happen again. and i do wish it never happened at all. but it did and i'm sorry. i guess all i can do is try to prevent it from happenin again. and i am . i just wish i did a long time ago.
it takes a lotta loss to realize a lotta stuff

ok welll....... this is my story: went to wills had a LITTLE bit of drank SOME people cant handle their alcohol whats gay is how mr hand knows EVERY detail hmm wonder who told him so yeah ONCE AGAIN, i get out of it. i was straight til mr hand was like 'i thought i told u to stay in my office' then i was like grrr and started cussin him out and stuff.. and i was like fuck band and walked off and stuff and went to lauren because she takes care of me i really dont give a shit what happens i can have a LIFE during football season now. so whatever. i'm out

umumumum i broke my car and um we went to lafayette and then i met mike... lol. and lauren is cuter. and he should have kissed YOU! um kyle is about to come over and work on my car lol i love kyle ok bye bye
